sentences.sContent: High structure strength, hot dip galvanized, greatly protract time of use.
sentences.sContent_eng: High structure strength, hot dip galvanized, greatly protract time of use.
sentences.sCn: 高强度管材、产品经热镀锌处理、大大地延长了使用寿命；

remMethod.val: pro (向前) + tract (拉) → 向前拉 → 延长

words.tran: 伸肌；分度器；伤处异物摘出器
拖延；绘制；伸展（protract的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to lengthen or extend (a speech, etc); prolong in time
